'''Character Development Items''' are items in ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' used to upgrade [[Characters]] and [[Weapons]]. It is the third tab in the [[Inventory]].

Items Groups in this category include:
* [[Character Ascension Materials]]
* [[Character EXP Materials]]
* [[Common Ascension Materials]]
* [[Refinement Materials]]
* [[Talent Level-Up Materials]]
* [[Weapon Ascension Materials]]
